unit_learning_outcomes.description: Adapt assessment and intervention plans to meet needs of individuals from distinct social and/or cultural groups to ensure culturally respectful care for people with lymphoedema (Engaged Global Citizen)
Use feedback from teachers, clinicians, peers and patients to inform self-evaluation and critical reflection of knowledge and skill development (Professional)

Demonstrate safe, effective, patient-centred skills and competencies in delivering high quality assessment andÂ management strategies for treating lymphoedema and chronic oedemas (Clinical Practitioner)
Demonstrate evidence based best practice management skills for the assessment and management of treating lymphoedema and chronic oedemas (Scientist and Scholar)

non_scheduled_learning_activities.description: A component of this micro unit will be presented as a series of well designed learning activities with embedded readings and knowledge checks.

enrolment_rules.description: AQF level 7 in a health degree or recognised equivalent with national registration if required

assessments.description: Multiple choice questions and short answer

data.unit_offering_text: To be determined, Infrequent attendance, North Ryde
data.subject_search_title: LYMP8006 - Professional Practice in Lymphoedema Management

school.value: Faculty of Medicine, Health and Human Sciences

data.description: This unit is one of a series of units examining specialist skill areas of clinical practice within lymphoedema and related areas of management and clinical relevance. In this unit you will develop professional practice skills in lymphoedema management including how an understanding and insight into how lymphoedema and chronic oedemas impacts an individual physically, functionally, psychologically, and financially. This unit will explore the integration of comprehensive assessment, clinical reasoning, communication and management skills to treat lymphoedema and chronic oedemas using complex lymphoedema therapy (CLT) into professional practice. In this unit you will reflect on latest evidence based practice and your own clinical skill and professional development through mentoring and reflective activities. The unit will assist your development of the Scientist and Scholar, Clinical Practitioner and Professional graduate capabilities.
data.search_title: LYMP8006 - Professional Practice in Lymphoedema Management
